greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Positive integers n with fewer prime factors (counted with multiplicity) than n + 1.
example: 49 = 7*7 has two prime factors, while 50 = 2*5*5 has three, so 49 belongs to the sequence.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Dec 28 2018
